options.name: Volatile Diet
options.description: You have survived on a diet most would consider exotic. You gain +1 Resilience and cannot become Poisoned or Diseased from consuming a substance.

options.name: The Bonds of Truth
options.description: The Dragonkind are known for honorbound honesty and can easily pick out a lie. Gain +2 Insight, but telling a lie or breaking a promise causes you to take 1d12 Psychic Damage.

options.name: Considerate Diplomats
options.description: The Dragonkind are used to treating with others and learning the tongues of other cultures. Gain +1 Persuasion and Learn a non-Magical Language.

options.name: Culture of Magic
options.description: The Dragonkind study the Arcane at a young age. Gain +1 Spell Damage and +1 Arcanum.

options.name: Trophy Hunters
options.description: The Dragonkind protect their homelands, slaying beasts and taking trophies. You can adorn Armor and Weapons by applying permanent Augments to them after they are Crafted without requiring a Check.

options.name: Draconic Magic
options.description: Dragonkind celebrate the magic gifted to them by their ancient ancestors. Learn 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Draconic Spells

options.name: Blessing of the Great Wyrm
options.description: Those who have spent time with the Dragonkind gain an ancient blessing. Gain +2 Elemental Mitigation and +2 Arcane Mitigation.
